title: GitSorted Note Item
description: A note item stored in a GitSorted notes project (items/<uuid>.json).

id.description: UUID v4 identifier. Must match the filename without .json.

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp. Set once at creation, never changed.

updatedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp. Updated on every mutation.

listOrder.description: Sort position in the list. Lower values appear first.
